c.t: 52.0305 Powers and Duties of the Health Officer

c.x: The Health Officer shall, upon the approval of Tribal Council, have the aut
Conduct, promote, and finance, in full or in part, with the approval of the
Order the enforcement of such quarantine and isolation orders as necessary
The closure of businesses or appropriate limits to the operations of busine
Social distancing;
Shelter in place;
Removal or exclusion of non-Indian individuals from the Tribe's jurisdictio
Recommend, as necessary, to Tribal Council appropriate responses to public
Recommend to Tribal Council policies and regulations governing the control
Communicate with tribal government authorities and businesses to coordinate
Communicate and coordinate responses to public health emergencies and issue
The Health Officer shall have the following powers and duties:
